meanings.definition: An immature form of an animal that undergoes metamorphosis
meanings.sent1: The larva of the butterfly looks very different from the adult.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the larva to understand its transformation process.
meanings.sent3: The larva tried on different outfits, hoping to transform into a butterfly instantly.
meanings.sent4: In the cocoon, the larva undergoes a magical metamorphosis into a beautiful butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The tiny larva crawled slowly, preparing for its grand transformation.

meanings.definition: A newly hatched insect in an early stage of development
meanings.sent1: The larva of the beetle was tiny and had just hatched.
meanings.sent2: The garden was full of larva crawling around in search of food.
meanings.sent3: The larva threw a tiny party to celebrate its recent hatching.
meanings.sent4: The larva, like a miniature explorer, ventured out into the world for the first time.
meanings.sent5: The young larva wiggled happily in the warm sunlight, exploring its new surroundings.
